descripcion: With soothing niacinamide and lipid-replenishing shea butter for nourished skin right out of the shower.
Provides greater facial sun protection with a broad spectrum dry touch sunscreen (UVA, UVB) and helps protect against damage caused by some infrared rays and pollution.
TOLERIANE MATTE CREAM soothes, protects and hydrates. A dermatocosmetic revolution for skin hydration. Safe, even for babies.
Fights breakouts and minimizes the appearance of marks and blemishes. All the benefits of SPF 30 protection with the well-being of a daily use moisturizer.
ULTRA FINE SCRUB gently exfoliates, soothes and purifies facial skin. In addition, it respects the physiological balance of the skin.
Is a concentrated treatment that combines an exfoliating triacid Complex (Glycolic Acid + Salicylic) with Niacinamide, to treat blemishes, marks and blackheads.
Helps fill in and repair the skin barrier around the eyes. For tired and fragile eye contours, wrinkles and fine lines, loss of volume and elasticity
Rich in selenium and trace elements, La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water has scientifically proven soothing and protective properties.
